title: A1418 iMac 21.5 2017 4K turn off after start booting
message:
hi,

got this iMac, holding down "Alt" by turning on I can select wich drive. This is not turning off the device

after selecting external known good disk I can see the apple and the loading line, after some milimeters from the loading line it turns off completly and start again.

RAM I replaced already both. With only one RAM also  tryed.

Is this a BIOS thing?

title: A1418 iMac 21.5 2017 4K turn off after start booting
message:
You should try known good clean ME BIOS.
Any history available?

title: A1418 iMac 21.5 2017 4K turn off after start booting
message:
no history, but looks clean
can u post me a link for a clean me bios? its an 820-01061

title: A1418 iMac 21.5 2017 4K turn off after start booting
message:
I don't have any for this board.
Try to clean original ME with Inetl FIT and UEFITool.

First, do PRAM reset 2-3 times, just in case.
